dcterms:creator: Wei-Yao Wang
Yung-Chang Huang
Tsi-Ui Ik
Wen-Chih Peng
dcterms:description: ShuttleSet22 is a stroke-level badminton singles dataset collected from high-ranking matches in 2022, consisting of 30,172 strokes in 2,888 rallies for training, 1,400 strokes in 450 rallies for validation, and 2,040 strokes in 654 rallies for testing, with detailed stroke-level metadata.
dcterms:title: ShuttleSet22

dcterms:creator: Kar-Weng Ban
John See
Junaidi Abdullah
Yuen Peng Loh
dcterms:description: BadmintonDB is a badminton dataset for player-specific match analysis and prediction, featuring rally, strokes, and outcome annotations between two players, but limited to specific matchups.
dcterms:title: BadmintonDB

dcterms:creator: Mathieu Cartron
dcterms:description: The Shuttlecock dataset contains 8K images of shuttlecocks, which are resized to 640x640 pixels and include the position of shuttlecocks for training object detection models.
dcterms:title: Shuttlecock dataset
